languages.text: {n}Спустя несколько тягостных секунд тишины она с шипением выпускает воздух сквозь сжатые зубы. Медленно на ее лице вместо гнева проявляется усталость. Отчаяние. Наконец, она едва слышно изрекает:{/n} "Наша связь, Домин'{name}. Наша связь была ошибкой. Я не выдерживаю это испытание, поскольку ход помыслов моих нарушен пустыми тревогами".

traits.locale_text: {n}Спустя несколько тягостных секунд тишины Кибелла с шипением выпускает воздух сквозь сжатые зубы. Медленно на ее лице вместо гнева проявляется усталость. Отчаяние. Наконец, она едва слышно изрекает:{/n} "Наша связь, Эним'{name}. Наша связь была ошибкой. Я не выдерживаю это испытание, поскольку ход помыслов моих нарушен пустыми тревогами".

languages.text: {n}After a few heavy seconds of silence, Kibellah exhales through clenched teeth. Fury slowly gives way to weariness, despair. Then, quietly, she says,{/n} "Our bond, Domin'{name}. Our bond was a mistake. I can't pass this trial because my thoughts are distracted by pointless worries."
languages.original_text: {n}Спустя несколько тягостных секунд тишины она с шипением выпускает воздух сквозь сжатые зубы. Медленно на ее лице вместо гнева проявляется усталость. Отчаяние. Наконец, она едва слышно изрекает:{/n} "Наша связь, Домин'{name}. Наша связь была ошибкой. Я не выдерживаю это испытание, поскольку ход помыслов моих нарушен пустыми тревогами".

traits.locale_text: {n}After a few heavy seconds of silence, she exhales through clenched teeth with a hiss. Her fury slowly gives way to weariness. Despair. Then she says quietly,{/n} "Our bond, Enim'{name}. Our bond was a mistake. I can't pass this trial because my thoughts are distracted by pointless worries."

{n}After a few heavy seconds of silence, she exhales through clenched teeth with a hiss. Her fury slowly gives way to weariness. Despair. Then she says quietly,{/n} "Our bond, Enim'{name}. Our bond was a mistake. I can't pass this trial because my thoughts are distracted by pointless worries."

{n}After a few heavy seconds of silence, she escape her clenched teeth with a hiss. Fury slowly gives way to weariness, despair. Then, quietly, she says,{/n} "Our bond, Enim'{name}. Our bond was a mistake. I can't pass this trial because my thoughts are distracted by pointless worries."

{n}After a few heavy seconds of silence, she escape her clenched teeth with a hiss. Fury slowly gives way to weariness, despair. Then, quietly, she says,{/n} "Our bond, Enim'{name}. Our bond was a mistake. I can't pass this trial because my thoughts are distracted by pointless worries."

{n}After a few heavy seconds of silence, Kibellah exhales through clenched teeth. Fury slowly gives way to weariness, despair. Then, quietly, she says,{/n} "Our bond, Domin'{name}. Our bond was a mistake. I can't pass this trial because my thoughts are distracted by pointless worries."

{n}After a few heavy seconds of silence, Kibellah exhales through clenched teeth. Fury slowly gives way to weariness, despair. Then, quietly, she says,{/n} "Our bond, Domin'{name}. Our bond was a mistake. I can't pass this trial because my thoughts are distracted by pointless worries."

languages.text: {n}Tras unos segundos de incómodo silencio, Kibellah exhala con los dientes apretados. Su furia se disipa gradualmente, dejando paso al hastío y la desesperación. Luego habla con voz queda:{/n} «Nuestro vínculo, Domin'{name}. Nuestro vínculo ha sido un error. No puedo superar esta prueba porque mi mente está distraída por preocupaciones infructuosas».
languages.original_text: {n}After a few heavy seconds of silence, Kibellah exhales through clenched teeth. Fury slowly gives way to weariness, despair. Then, quietly, she says,{/n} "Our bond, Domin'{name}. Our bond was a mistake. I can't pass this trial because my thoughts are distracted by pointless worries."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tras unos segundos de incómodo silencio, Kibellah exhala con los dientes apretados. Su furia se disipa gradualmente, dejando paso al hastío y la desesperación. Luego habla con voz queda:{/n} «Nuestro vínculo, Domin'{name}. Nuestro vínculo ha sido un error. No puedo superar esta prueba porque mi mente está distraída por preocupaciones infructuosas».

languages.text: {n}数秒の重い沈黙の後、キベラは食いしばった歯の間から息を吐く。怒りは次第に疲弊に、そして絶望へと変わっていく。その後、静かに、彼女は言った。{/n}「私たちの絆よ、ドミン・{name}。私たちの絆は間違いだった。無意味なことに気を取られてばかりいるから、試練に合格できない」
languages.original_text: {n}After a few heavy seconds of silence, Kibellah exhales through clenched teeth. Fury slowly gives way to weariness, despair. Then, quietly, she says,{/n} "Our bond, Domin'{name}. Our bond was a mistake. I can't pass this trial because my thoughts are distracted by pointless worries."

traits.locale_text: {n}数秒の重い沈黙の後、キベラは食いしばった歯の間から息を吐く。怒りは次第に疲弊に、そして絶望へと変わっていく。その後、静かに、彼女は言った。{/n}「私たちの絆よ、ドミン・{name}。私たちの絆は間違いだった。無意味なことに気を取られてばかりいるから、試練に合格できない」

languages.text: {n}沉重的沉默持续了几秒钟。绮贝菈咬紧牙关，深深地呼出一大口气，她的怒火渐渐变成了疲惫与绝望。随后，她平静地开了口。{/n}“我们之间的纽带，秘者{name}，我们之间的纽带是个错误。我恐怕没办法通过这场试炼，因为我被毫无意义的担忧分散了注意力。”
languages.original_text: {n}After a few heavy seconds of silence, Kibellah exhales through clenched teeth. Fury slowly gives way to weariness, despair. Then, quietly, she says,{/n} "Our bond, Domin'{name}. Our bond was a mistake. I can't pass this trial because my thoughts are distracted by pointless worries."

traits.locale_text: {n}沉重的沉默持续了几秒钟。绮贝菈咬紧牙关，深深地呼出一大口气，她的怒火渐渐变成了疲惫与绝望。随后，她平静地开了口。{/n}“我们之间的纽带，秘者{name}，我们之间的纽带是个错误。我恐怕没办法通过这场试炼，因为我被毫无意义的担忧分散了注意力。”

languages.text: {n}Nach einigen schweren Sekunden der Stille atmet Kibellah durch zusammengebissene Zähne aus. Die Wut weicht langsam Erschöpfung und Verzweiflung. Dann sagt sie leise.{/n} "Unser Band, Domin'{name}. Unser Band war ein Fehler. Ich kann diese Prüfung nicht bestehen, weil meine Gedanken von sinnlosen Sorgen abgelenkt werden."
languages.original_text: {n}After a few heavy seconds of silence, Kibellah exhales through clenched teeth. Fury slowly gives way to weariness, despair. Then, quietly, she says,{/n} "Our bond, Domin'{name}. Our bond was a mistake. I can't pass this trial because my thoughts are distracted by pointless worries."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nach einigen schweren Sekunden der Stille atmet Kibellah durch zusammengebissene Zähne aus. Die Wut weicht langsam Erschöpfung und Verzweiflung. Dann sagt sie leise.{/n} "Unser Band, Domin'{name}. Unser Band war ein Fehler. Ich kann diese Prüfung nicht bestehen, weil meine Gedanken von sinnlosen Sorgen abgelenkt werden."

languages.text: {n}Après quelques secondes de silence pesant, Kibellah pousse un soupir entre ses dents serrées, et sa fureur cède lentement la place à la lassitude et au désespoir. Puis, elle reprend calmement :{/n} « Notre lien, Domin'{name}. Notre lien était une erreur. Si je n'arrive pas à surmonter cette épreuve, c'est parce que mes pensées se dissipent en vaines préoccupations. »
languages.original_text: {n}After a few heavy seconds of silence, Kibellah exhales through clenched teeth. Fury slowly gives way to weariness, despair. Then, quietly, she says,{/n} "Our bond, Domin'{name}. Our bond was a mistake. I can't pass this trial because my thoughts are distracted by pointless worries."

Puis, elle reprend calmement :{/n} « Notre lien, Domin'{name}. Notre lien était une erreur. Si je n'arrive pas à surmonter cette épreuve, c'est parce que mes pensées se dissipent en vaines préoccupations. »

languages.original_text: {n}After a few heavy seconds of silence, Kibellah exhales through clenched teeth. Fury slowly gives way to weariness, despair. Then, quietly, she says,{/n} "Our bond, Domin'. Our bond was a mistake. I can't pass this trial because my thoughts are distracted by pointless worries."

languages.text: {n}Yavaş geçen birkaç saniyelik bir sessizliğin ardından Kibellah, dişlerini sıka sıka nefes alıp veriyor. Yavaş yavaş öfkesinin yerini bitkinlik ve ümitsizlik alıyor. Ardından kısık bir sesle konuşmaya başlıyor.{/n} "Aramızdaki bağ var ya Domin'{name}... Bağ kurmakla hata etmişiz. Zihnimi saran anlamsız endişeler yüzünden bu sınavdan geçemiyorum."
languages.original_text: {n}After a few heavy seconds of silence, Kibellah exhales through clenched teeth. Fury slowly gives way to weariness, despair. Then, quietly, she says,{/n} "Our bond, Domin'{name}. Our bond was a mistake. I can't pass this trial because my thoughts are distracted by pointless worries."
